name: ClayJumper
description:
Went on vacation on day 3 of the game jam, so only had time to play around with the "Clayify" houdini asset and set up the proof-of-concept gameplay, and get a build going. WIP

Jumping platform high-score game where you got to match the color of the clay ball and stay on that platform. Platform decision times go faster every time, try to get a high score.

Should work with a controller as well

Controls: WASD

Spacebar - Jump
